We have been with learning vision for 7 years!
LV CBP has been an amazing place for my children!
The teachers are patient, attentive, and truly passionate about what they do. So you won’t experience changing of teachers often.
Principal, VP, staff admins and teachers always go the extra mile to make parents feel involved.

The curriculums are well-structured, balancing learning and play in a way that keeps the kids engaged and excited.
I’ve seen so much growth in my kids’ confidence and social skills since joining.

Also, the facility is clean, safe, and well-maintained. There is 0 outbreaks of any disease during our years here.

I’m so grateful to have found this preschool and would highly recommend it to other families!

Teachers are warm and caring. They also invest great personal effort to develop every child. The centre director and admin staff are very responsive and help to share the responsibility of looking after the children with the teachers outside class time. Overall, the centre provides a holistic education for my child.

Learning Vision @ CBP has provided a safe and fun learning environment for my kids. All the teachers and staff are very dedicated and care a lot for the children. My kids enjoy attending school and l count my blessing for such a wonderful preschool. Would highly recommend to all parents who are looking for a preschool for their child.

Learning Vision stands out as a daycare that not only provides exceptional care for children but also prioritizes their holistic development. With a warm and organised atmosphere, and a well-rounded curriculum, children thrive academically, socially, and emotionally.

As working parents, the peace of mind knowing that our child is with capable and skilled educators allows us to focus on our careers, supported by regular updates and communication from the teachers.

Learning Vision nurtures a collaborative relationship between families and the daycare, fostering an environment where both children and parents can thrive together.

Visited many many preschool before deciding this center for my first born . It turn out to be one of the best choice i made in my parenting journey . The teachers have good rapport within parents , child and even among teachers. The curriculum is strong that my firstborn had no problem adjusting and keeping up when she enter primary school . They make sure that the children and parents are informed of every minor and major change . Yearly when the children are promoted to the next level , current teachers will take lots of time to prepare , preempt the children of the changes ahead, making sure that they are informed , ready and looking forward .

Teachers are very dedicated . They deal with parents anxiety , concern and children safety with such thoughtfulness that you know that they truly care for your children . Principal Lai Peng is one principal that i have seen fiercely protect the interest of the children and builds a wonderful team . One of the good selfless principal u rarely see.

Cleanliness is also one thing to rave about in LV@CBP . They deal with every potential case with such determination to ensure there is no outbreak .

One giveaway if the center host happy children will be the level of chirpiness in the children when u visit the school . The kids is always chirpy with bright smile . This is drew me to the school in first place . You do not see kids stiffening up when the teacher enters the room . Instead they ran and hug the teacher . My second born is now in the school , she always tells me about her day in school , and its always with bright smile .
She always look forward to going to school .

This is one place that brings out the sunshine in children . good work LV@CBP !
